thread.section_title: Didriks Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Didriks | didriks.com
thread.title: Jeremiah

author: Jeremiah
title: Jeremiah
text: I have shopped at Didriks and its sister store Local Root numerous times during the six years I lived in Cambridge Massachusetts. I have moved from Cambridge, but if I need something which Didriks sells I make a point of shopping there when I visit Cambridge. My most recent visit was January 2017 when I stopped by to look at and purchase Pillivyut porcelain coffee and espresso cups. Over the years I've purchased a complete set (service for 16) of Pillivyut dinnerware mixing and matching elements from various series. In addition I use Pillivyut bakeware. The selection is well chosen but not for everyone. I would never buy some of the items because they are too expensive or don't suit my needs. The service has always been excellent. Highly recommended.
